text:
The new Collectors of Perambalur and Karur districts assumed charge on Friday. While K. Nandakumar took charge as Collector, Perambalur district, T.P. Rajesh assumed office as Collector of Karur district.

Mr. Nandakumar succeeds Darez Ahamed and Mr. Rajesh has been posted in the place of S. Jayandhi.
title: New Collectors assume charge
